alert.note: Alert for Lower Washington County; Southern Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong outflow winds from showers and thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Washington County through 445 PM MDT... At 358 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong outflow winds associated with showers and thunderstorms 7 miles northeast of Santa Clara, or 22 miles northeast of Virgin River Gorge. This storm is moving south at near 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St George, Washington, Hurricane, Santa Clara, Quail Creek State Park, Gunlock State Park, Sand Hollow State Park, Dameron Valley, Ivins, Toquerville, Leeds, Bloomington, Gunlock and Snow Canyon State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 1 and 28. Utah Route 18 between mile markers 0 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
